text:
my daughter has been there for a year, and are great. victor is responsive and cares for the children safety and wellbeing.
the teachers are also nice and helpful with the kids schoolwork.
the different and more fun style of their additional enrichment classes and materials also keeps the child interest.
separately, the pickup/dropoff location is very convenient and safe (same floor).

I’m thrilled this center has finally opened! It’s incredibly convenient, located close to my house, so I can easily drop off my two boys on my way to work. The facilities are top-notch, and I’m confident my sons will grow and learn so much here. Definitely an A-star center, highly recommended.

The center offers a diverse range of programs, including Creative Math, Robotics, and Coding, which keep the children entertained and intellectually stimulated. Teachers are putting in effort to ensure children's happiness and well-being. Its convenient location, efficient communication, and impressive student-to-teacher ratio further add to its appeal.
The principal is very kind and the school facilities are perfect. It is a favourite place for children.
Finally a PlayFACTO at Labrador to serve happy kids!! Great and dedicated team managing the centre, cosy environment and engaging activities - what’s not to love?
